question: In Some Counties, fast-food restaurants and supermarkets give money to schools to promote their Products. Do you think this is Positive or negative development...
text: School plays a vital role for children; it helps them. Grow physically and mentally, but nowadays, these schools have Started promoting fast cuisine because Supermarkets and restaurants fund them, and these steps will lead teenagers toward the dark side of the future. It affects their health, and also they start preferring fast foods.

Firstly It affects the health of children. They would not know which eating thing they have to choose; scholars are immature. They are mainly dependent on their elders to make any choice. Due to the consumption of less nutrient meals, their immune system becomes weak, and they suffer from various diseases such as food poison.

(In addition to this, the importance of healthy bread will downturn when School body Start Promoting quick foodstuff for their greediness for money Students will think that these meals are good for them they start preferencing quick foods

This trend will not stop in the life of children. It will also affect nation growth youngsters eat an unhealthy snacks, so their academic performance will shrinkage. State bodies conducted a study in order to track the reason for decreasing academic Performance of Students, and Survey was concluded that consumption of less nutritious foodstuff leads to poor academic performance
Lastly, I conclude that this trend will not help in any sector teenagers will become unhealthy, the importance of healthy feed will lost, and the nation's growth will also be affected.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article an may not be required with the plural noun snacks in this sentence. Consider removing the article, or changing the noun to singular.
The verb lost after the modal verb will does not appear to be in the correct form. Consider changing the verb form.
